T02D2662:12a-2: / de rtogs 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2662:12a-4: nyid la dmigs pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2662:12a-5: du rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa'o snyam du

T02D2662:12a-15: tshe / sangs rgyas zhes bya bar tha snyad gdags pa de ston te /
T02D2662:12a-16: gang gis sa bcu bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2662:12a-17: dbang bcu legs rtogs khong du chud //

T02D2662:12a-20: 'jig rten kun gyi tshul mkhyen pa //

T02D2662:12a-29: stong pa nyid du ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin nam

T02D2662:12a-31: du mtshan nyid gcig par rtogs par bya ste /

T02D2662:12a-33: rdzogs par byang chub ba zhes bya'o zhes bya bar ston te /

T02D2662:12a-35: gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid gcig / stobs bcu rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa //

T02D2662:12a-38: rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba yang chos
T02D2662:12a-39: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gcig par rtogs

T02D2662:12b-0: gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba rnam par dag @12b pa'o //
T02D2662:12b-1: tshor ba rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa ste /

T02D2662:12b-6: so // rdzogs par byang chub pa'i ye shes rtogs
T02D2662:12b-7: pa'i gnas skabs 'di yang 'di las dpa' bo chen
T02D2662:12b-8: po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa las /

T02D2662:12b-15: byang chub kyi snying por nye bar gshegs pa sngon
T02D2662:12b-16: du 'gro ba can dpa' bo chen po'i ting nge

T02D2662:12b-23: bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bcom pas //

T02D2662:12b-27: dga' ba bzhin du sgrogs par byed //

T02D2662:12b-30: skye ba med par ngas rtogs pa //
T02D2662:12b-31: tshig gi spyod yul rnam spangs shing //

T02D2662:12b-33: rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin //
T02D2662:12b-34: stong pa'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba //

T02D2662:12b-36: shin tu dri med de kho na //
T02D2662:12b-38: kun mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas //

T02D2662:13a-0: de la dpa' bo chen po rdzogs par byang chub pa'i @13a * //

T02D2662:13a-31: byang chub pa kun du bstan te /

T02D2662:40b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2662:40b-6: der gsang sngags brjod cing slob ma chos kyi dbyings
T02D2662:40b-7: kyi ngo bo nyid stong par byin gyis brlab par
T02D2662:40b-8: bya'o // de'i rjes la chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas de'i sngags brjod cing /
T02D2662:40b-9: slob ma de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D2662:40b-10: de nas de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2662:40b-11: pa'i lag par me tog bzhag la dam tshig gsum
T02D2662:40b-12: gyi sngags lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D2662:40b-13: de'i rjes la de'i spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge bsam bar bya'o //
T02D2662:40b-14: de nas bden pa'i byin rlabs bya ste /
T02D2662:40b-15: phyag rgya la 'dug pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du dor du bcug la /
T02D2662:40b-16: gang la me tog bab pa de'i gsang sngags de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2662:40b-17: slob ma sngon de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong
T02D2662:40b-18: ba dam tshig can gsang sngags mnos pa ni gdong
T02D2662:40b-20: phyis phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i me tog rnams dkyil
T02D2662:40b-21: 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2662:40b-22: mdzad dam / sngon de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2662:40b-23: du rang gi rig sngags mnos pa yong na dbul
T02D2662:40b-24: mdzad dam / bar bya'o // gtan tshigs ni sngon gyi dkyil 'khor mthong ba gsang sngags mnos pa /
T02D2662:40b-25: dam tshig can rnams ni gdong ma bkab pa kho
T02D2662:40b-26: nar bden pa'i byin rlabs sngon du 'gro ba nyid
T02D2662:40b-27: kyis me tog dor bar 'dod pa nyid de /
T02D2662:40b-28: de ltar rig sngags kyi cha mang po nyid kyis
T02D2662:40b-29: sgrub pa po rig sngags du ma bsgrub pa'i snod
T02D2662:40b-30: can / sngon mnos pa'i rig sngags la ma gtogs pa /
T02D2662:40b-31: de las gzhan pa'i rig sngags la me tog bab na /
T02D2662:40b-32: rig sngags gnyis bzlas rjod byed pa'i go skabs su 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2662:40b-33: rnam pa gcig tu na rig sngags gang yang rung
T02D2662:40b-34: ba zhig bzlas brjod byed cing de las gzhan pa'i
T02D2662:40b-35: rig sngags khyad du gsad na phung ba 'byung bar
T02D2662:40b-37: gang la me tog bab pa'ang //
T02D2662:41a-2: bzlas brjod byas na brlag par 'gyur //
T02D2662:41a-4: dkyil 'khor gsum du slob ma gzung pa'i cho ga 'di yang /
T02D2662:41a-5: rgyud 'di la gzhung 'di kho nas bstan te /
T02D2662:41a-7: slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste ;
T02D2662:41a-8: / sngags pa yis ni bsang gtor bya //
T02D2662:41a-9: dri dang me tog phreng sbyin bya //
T02D2662:41a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas //
T02D2662:41a-11: byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug / des na rgyal ba'i rigs dag la //
T02D2662:41a-12: thams cad rab tu skyes par 'gyur //
T02D2662:41a-13: chos kyi dbyings las skyes pa yis //
T02D2662:41a-14: phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcings //
T02D2662:41a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bcings nas ni //
T02D2662:41a-16: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2662:41a-17: de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni //
T02D2662:41a-18: dam tshig sdom brtson bdag gis bcings //
T02D2662:41a-19: de tshe sngags pas cho ga bzhin //
T02D2662:41a-20: ras la lan gsum gdab par bya //
T02D2662:41a-21: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su //
T02D2662:41a-22: de dag gis ni gdong yang bkab //
T02D2662:41a-23: dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni //
T02D2662:41a-24: spyi bor yi ge ra zhes bya //
T02D2662:41a-25: glad kyi 'khor bcas brjid dang ldan //
T02D2662:41a-27: zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi //
T02D2662:41a-28: kha dog dkar po gzhag par bya //
T02D2662:41a-29: skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
T02D2662:41a-30: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / me tog gang la bab pa de //
T02D2662:41a-31: sngags pas de la sbyin par bya //
T02D2662:41a-32: dkyil 'khor dang po sgo yi drung //
T02D2662:41a-33: sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha //
T02D2662:41a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi //
T02D2662:41a-35: bar du slob ma gzung bar bya //
T02D2662:41a-36: der gnas pa la cho ga kun ;
T02D2662:41a-37: / rim pa bzhin du legs par bya //
T02D2662:41a-38: zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin te /
T02D2662:41a-39: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gsum char du 'jug pa'i spyi'i cho ga yin no //
T02D2662:41a-40: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni khyad
T02D2662:41a-41: par du cho ga gzhan bstan pas de brjod par
T02D2662:41a-42: bya ste / re zhig dang por snying rje chen po'i snying po can dang /
T02D2662:41a-43: yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang
T02D2662:41a-44: bskur ba thob pa'i slob ma sngar bshad pa'i cho
T02D2662:41a-45: ga kho nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la
T02D2662:41a-46: / de'i nang du legs par bzhag nas de'i snying
T02D2662:41a-47: khar ram zhas bya ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2662:41b-0: pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa @41b rnam par
T02D2662:41b-1: / bsam ste / de'i 'bar bas de'i lus thams cad thal bar brlag par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2662:41b-2: thal ba'i dbus su sa bon du gyur pa'i yi
T02D2662:41b-3: ge aom zhes bya ba me tog kunda dang zla
T02D2662:41b-4: ba lta bur dkar ba rnam par brtag par bya
T02D2662:41b-5: ste / des kyang lus de nyid kyang bcom ldan
T02D2662:41b-6: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgrub pa nas
T02D2662:41b-7: ste / / de'i gdan padma la rig pa'i rgyal
T02D2662:41b-8: po tshig yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung bar bsam par
T02D2662:41b-9: ste / / bya'o // slob ma la yang khyod
T02D2662:41b-10: nyid kyis kyang 'di ltar sgoms shig bya ba'i lung
T02D2662:41b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D2662:41b-14: kun du bslab pa'i sngags pa ni //
T02D2662:41b-15: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la mkhas pas //
T02D2662:41b-16: de tshe slob ma'i sdig pa kun //
T02D2662:41b-17: cho ga bzhin du bsreg par bya //
T02D2662:41b-18: ci nas slar yang mi skye bar //
T02D2662:41b-19: de yi 'tsho ba'ang bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2662:41b-20: bsregs te thal bar gyur nas kyang //
T02D2662:41b-21: de ni slar yang gso bar bya //
T02D2662:41b-22: yi ge yis ni mi 'gyur bsreg /'tsho bas slar yang gso bar bya //
T02D2662:41b-23: 'tsho bas thams cad gsos pa ni //
T02D2662:41b-24: kun du dag cing dri ma med //
T02D2662:41b-25: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig rnams ni //
T02D2662:41b-26: de yi snod la dgod par bya //
T02D2662:41b-27: byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //
T02D2662:41b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig ni //
T02D2662:41b-29: sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang //
T02D2662:41b-30: 'jig rten rnams kyis bkur ba yin //
T02D2662:41b-31: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D2662:41b-32: dam tshig 'di ni sus rig pa //
T02D2662:41b-33: rgyud rnams kun du zhugs pa dang //
T02D2662:41b-34: dkyil 'khor kun la dbang ba yin //
T02D2662:41b-35: sngags pa de ni nga dang 'dra //
T02D2662:41b-36: dam tshig ces ni gzhan mi bya //
T02D2662:41b-37: zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin no //
T02D2662:41b-39: kun du bslab pa'i sngags pa ni //
T02D2662:41b-40: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pas //
T02D2662:41b-41: zhes bya ba ni snying rje chen po'i snying po
T02D2662:41b-42: can la sogs pa dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga
T02D2662:41b-43: dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad bsgrub pa'i yan lag gi cho ga dag las /
T02D2662:41b-44: thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung
T02D2662:41b-45: ba'i shes rab kyis ci nus su nan tan du
T02D2662:41b-46: bslab pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa yin no //
T02D2662:41b-47: de cho slob ma'i sdig pa kun //
T02D2662:42a-2: zhes bya ba la 'dir sdig pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D2662:42a-3: sgra ni 'dir ni mi 'dod pa'i las kyi bag
T02D2662:42a-4: chags ngan song ba yin par dgongs pa yin no
T02D2662:42a-5: // der bsreg pa ni slob ma'i rgyud bsal ba yin no //
T02D2662:42a-6: de la dgongs pa ni slob ma'i snying gar chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge dgod pa dang /
T02D2662:42a-7: de'i don sems pa'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du brtag par bya'o //
T02D2662:42a-8: slob ma nyid kyang de bzhin du bdag nyid la mos par bya'o //
T02D2662:42a-9: de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi sems mos pa ni
T02D2662:42a-10: mi 'dod pa'i las kyi bag chags kyis mi mthun
T02D2662:42a-11: pa'i phyogs yin pas sdig pa kun /
T02D2662:42a-12: cho ga bzhin du bsreg par bya //
T02D2662:42a-14: de yi cho ga'ang bsreg par bya //
T02D2662:42a-15: zhes bya ba la 'tsho ba ni rang gi lus la bya ste /
T02D2662:42a-16: de bas na dgos pa ni chos kyi dbyings su
T02D2662:42a-17: mos pa sdig pa'i bag chags kyi gnyen po yin
T02D2662:42a-18: pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D2662:42a-19: lus su snang ba'i gnyen po yang yin no snyam

T02D2662:42a-22: ni slob dpon dang slob ma dag chos kyi dbyings
T02D2662:42a-23: su shin tu mos pa ston par byed do //

T02D2662:42a-25: zhes pa 'dis ni chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge
T02D2662:42a-26: snying gar dgod pa de'i don sems pa'i sgo nas
T02D2662:42a-27: slob ma chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2662:42a-28: byin gyis brlab par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma
T02D2662:42a-29: zad kyi / ram zhes bya ba snying gar bkod
T02D2662:42a-30: pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa de kho nas
T02D2662:42a-31: slob ma thal bar brlag par yang bsam par bya
T02D2662:42a-33: de ni slar yang gso bar bya //
T02D2662:42a-34: zhes bya ba ni yang rang gi lus su snang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T02D2662:42a-35: de yi 'tsho ba'ang bsreg par bya //
T02D2662:42a-36: zhes gang gsungs pa gang gis bsreg par bya ba ma gsungs pas de'i phyir /
T02D2662:42a-37: yi ge yis ni mi 'gyur bsreg / ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2662:42a-38: de la yi ge yis zhes bya ba ni ram
T02D2662:42a-39: zhes bya pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pas zhes bya
T02D2662:42a-40: bar khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2662:42a-41: mi 'gyur bsreg ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid las mi 'gyur bas na mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2662:42a-42: bsreg pa ni legs par bsreg ces bshad pa yin no //
T02D2662:42a-43: de ni slar yang gso bar bya //
T02D2662:42b-0: ji ltar gso bar bya ba ni ma @42b bshad pas de'i phyir /
T02D2662:42b-1: 'tsho pas slar yang gso bar bya //
T02D2662:42b-3: de la 'tsho ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir aa
T02D2662:42b-4: zhes bya ba yi ga thams cad kyi 'tsho ba
T02D2662:42b-7: aa zhes bya ba 'tsho bar bshad //
T02D2662:42b-8: kun du gtso bor dbang phyug yin //
T02D2662:42b-9: zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin no //
T02D2662:42b-10: de'i phyir aa zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2662:42b-11: kyi skur byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam du dgongs
T02D2662:42b-12: pa yin no // de nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2662:42b-13: 'tsho ba thams cad gso ba yin //
T02D2662:42b-14: kun du dag cing dri ma med //
T02D2662:42b-16: 'di ni gdan padma la bzhugs pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba yin no //
T02D2662:42b-17: padma de'i 'dab ma de dag la rig pa'i rgyal
T02D2662:42b-18: po tshig yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'byung bar bsam
T02D2662:42b-20: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig rnams ni //
T02D2662:42b-21: de yi snod la dgod par bya //
T02D2662:42b-23: snod ni 'dir rten yin par bshad do ;
T02D2662:42b-24: / de lta bas na rim pa 'dis slob ma
T02D2662:42b-25: rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgrub pa de yin
T02D2662:42b-26: pa de nyid 'dir mi rung ba'i don dam rtogs
T02D2662:42b-27: par bya ba'i don gyis dam tshig yin no //
T02D2662:42b-28: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2662:42b-29: gzugs kyi skur mos par bya pa'i dam tshig gang
T02D2662:42b-30: yin pa de ni thams cad kyis bkur zhing mngon
T02D2662:42b-31: par 'dod pa la 'da' bar bya ba ma yin
T02D2662:42b-32: no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste de nyid kyi
T02D2662:42b-33: phyir / byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang //
T02D2662:42b-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig 'di //

T02D2662:42b-38: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyi dam

T02D2662:43a-2: zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyud thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D2662:43a-3: 'khor dag tu dam tshig can ngag tu 'gyur ro
T02D2662:43a-4: snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T02D2662:43a-5: dkyil 'khor kun la dbang ba yin //
T02D2662:43a-6: zhes bya ba ni rgyud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2662:43a-7: gyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro zhes bshad par 'gyur
T02D2662:43a-9: 'tsho pas thams cad gsos pa ni //
T02D2662:43a-10: kun du dag cing dri ma med //
T02D2662:43a-11: ces bshad pa'i tshig 'di slob ma rnam par snang
T02D2662:43a-12: mdzad kyi skur bya'o zhes gsal bar kun du ma
T02D2662:43a-13: bstan pas / sngags pa de ni nga dang 'dra //
T02D2662:43a-14: dam tshig can ni gzhan mi bya //
T02D2662:43a-16: 'di'i don slob ma des bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das
T02D2662:43a-17: rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur bsgom par bya'o zhes
T02D2662:43a-18: pa yin no // da ni dbang bskur ba'i rim pa kun nas bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D2662:43a-19: de la dbang bskur ba'i sgra'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2662:43a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi lha bris pa rnams kyi mdun du
T02D2662:43a-21: gsher bar bya ba'i khrus gang yin pa de ni
T02D2662:43a-22: dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don yin
T02D2662:43a-23: no // dbang bskur ba de yang slob ma ji lta bu zhig la bya ba dang /
T02D2662:43a-25: ci'i phyir bya ba zhes bya ba 'di gsum brjod par bya ste /

T02D2662:43a-28: dam tshig dkyil 'khor mthong ba byang chub kyi sems
T02D2662:43a-29: la legs par goms par byas pa nyid kyis shes

T02D2662:43a-31: pa las byung ba'i shes rab shin tu rnam par

T02D2662:43a-35: chud pa theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo la

T02D2662:43a-37: brtan par bya ba'i slob ma 'di ni dbang bskur
T02D2662:43a-39: gnyis pa ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mthong ba

T02D2662:43a-41: dang rtog pa dag la thos pa dang bsams pa
T02D2662:43a-42: dang goms pas sems kyi rgyud shin tu dri ma
T02D2662:43a-43: med par byas pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa

T02D2662:43b-0: dmigs pa can nyid kyis @43b phyi'i bya ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te /

T02D2662:43b-16: lus can rnams ni yid mi rton //
T02D2662:43b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste //

T02D2662:43b-19: gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis //

T02D2662:43b-24: rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur //
T02D2662:43b-25: zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin no //
